heading_api.label: API Details
heading_api.comment: You can find your Api Keys in your Mollie Profile.

heading_settings.label: Settings
heading_settings.comment: Configure the general Mollie Payment Payment status and Payment Icons.

loading_screen.label: Use Loading screen
loading_screen.comment: Use loading screen before redirect. This will enable mobile users to use the back button.

order_status_pending.label: Status Pending
order_status_pending.comment: Set the order status before the customer is redirected to Payment Gateway.

order_status_processing.label: Status Processing
order_status_processing.comment: Set the order status for Completed Payments.

invoice_notify.label: Send Invoice Email
invoice_notify.comment: Set the notification for to Notify the customer with the Invoice.

locale.label: Language Payment Page
locale.comment: Let Mollie automatically detect the language or force a language for your store view.

currency.label: Use Base Currency
currency.comment: Force use of base currency for the payment request. Is set to no the selected currency of the storeview will be used for request.

transaction_details.label: Show Transaction Details
transaction_details.comment: Display Transaction Details like e.g. IBAN, BIC, Paypal Reference, Card Holder etc.

cancel_failed_orders.label: Cancel the order when the connection fails
cancel_failed_orders.comment: When an error occurs while sending the data to Mollie the order will be cancelled if this option is enabled.

heading_debugging.label: Debugging
heading_debugging.comment: Especially for Developers you can enable the Debug mode.

debug.label: Debug requests
debug.comment: When activated the debug file will be located in: var/log/mollie.log

heading_compatibility.label: Compatibility
heading_compatibility.comment: Check the Mollie extension technical requirements by running the self test. In case of a warning or error please contact your Developer or Hosting Company.

method.label: Method
method.comment:
Payment API
Use the Payment API Platform for the transactions.

Order API
Use the new Order API Platform and get additional insights in the orders. Read more.

payment_description.label: Description
payment_description.comment:
The description to be used for this transaction. These variables are available:

{ordernumber}: The order number for this transaction.
{storename}: The name of the store.
{customerCompany}: The name of the company of the customer. Can be empty.
{customerName}: The name on the billing address. Includes first, middle and last when available.

(Note: This only works when the method is set to Payments API)

method.label: Method
method.comment:
Payment API
Use the Payment API Platform for the transactions.

Order API
Use the new Order API Platform and get additional insights in the orders. Read more.

payment_description.comment:

(Note: This only works when the method is set to Payments API)

due_days.label: Due Days
due_days.comment: The number of days after which the payment should expire. Please note: Minimum is 1 and the maximum is 100.

order_status_pending.label: Status Pending
order_status_pending.comment: Set the status for unpaid banktransfer orders.

Order API
Use the new Order API Platform and get additional insights in the orders. Read more.

use_components.label: Use Mollie Components
use_components.comment:
With Components the customer can enter their credit card details within your webshop.
Note: You need to enter your Profile ID in the general section of this extension configuration to use Mollie Components.

payment_surcharge.label: in3 Payment Surcharge
payment_surcharge.comment: Enter the extra costs for a in3 Pay Later payment with a maximum of 1.95

invoice_moment.label: When to create the invoice?
invoice_moment.comment:
When do we create the invoice?
On Authorize and set status Paid before shipment:
Create a full invoice with the status Paid after the order is authorized and not shipped yet.

On Authorize and set payment status Paid after shipment:
Create a full invoice with the payment status Pending after the order is authorized and set payment status to Paid after a shipment.

On Shipment (recommended):
Create a (partial) invoice for shipped item(s).

payment_surcharge.label: Klarna Payment Surcharge
payment_surcharge.comment: Enter the extra costs for a Klarna Pay Later payment with a maximum of 1.95

invoice_moment.label: When to create the invoice?
invoice_moment.comment:
When do we create the invoice?
On Authorize and set status Paid before shipment:
Create a full invoice with the status Paid after the order is authorized and not shipped yet.

On Authorize and set payment status Paid after shipment:
Create a full invoice with the payment status Pending after the order is authorized and set payment status to Paid after a shipment.

On Shipment (recommended):
Create a (partial) invoice for shipped item(s).

invoice_moment.label: When to create the invoice?

On Authorize and set status Paid before shipment:

On Authorize and set payment status Paid after shipment:
Create a full invoice with the payment status Pending after the order is authorized and set payment status to Paid after a shipment.

On Shipment (recommended):

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: Please note: This payment method is only visible when the device of the user Apple Pay has enabled and the checkout is served over HTTPS.
